About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself

My name is Madeline. I live in Seattle, Washington. I am a front-end developer and love building webpages as much as I do the design process. In the summer, I spend my evenings outside listening to music, reading, going to trivia with friends, or exploring new recipes to make.
